As soon as Needlenose whirled around, he was face to face with
Spinister. Spinister emitted in a low whispering voice. "Long time no
see." he said, gently putting his hand up on Sunstreak, to lower him out
of the way.
______________________________________________________________________

Hook transformed, then walked over to Scrapper. "Yes this would do
nicely." he said, pointing to Scrappers brain child.
